name: github-pr-review
description: Review open pull requests on GitHub, analyze code changes, and leave review comments
author: mediar-ai
excerpt: Review open pull requests in a GitHub repository, checking code changes and leaving review comments.  ## Prerequisites  - Chrome browser installed - Logged into GitHub - Repository URL provided by use

name: notion-daily-note
description: Create a structured daily note in Notion with tasks, schedule, and reflection sections
author: mediar-ai
excerpt: Create a daily note in Notion with a structured template for planning your day.  ## Prerequisites  - Chrome browser installed - Logged into Notion - A workspace with a "Daily Notes" page or database
